about_the_game:
Supercars, Neon-Illuminated Cities, and Endless Highways: Welcome to Neon Highways, Where the '80s Come Back to Life!

Listening to Synthwave or Retrowave often sparks a peculiar sense of nostalgia—one that reaches back to a time we never quite knew, or perhaps one that never truly existed. Fueled by the vibrant spirit of the ’80s yet infused with futuristic visions, Retrowave captures an idealized version of that decade: neon skylines, endless highways, and hypnotic beats pulsing in the night.

In Neon Highways, you’ll slip into this dreamy realm, leaving the mundane world behind for a few precious moments. Cruise through luminous cityscapes, feel the hum of your engine beneath the glow of neon lights, and lose yourself to the sounds that defined an era—reborn in retro-futuristic splendor. This is your invitation to live out the ’80s you always imagined, if only for a little while.

What’s waiting for you in Neon Highways?

Immersive Synthwave Worlds: Cruise through breathtaking environments inspired by the ‘80s, from neon-filled cities to sun-soaked highways under purple skies. Each location is designed to capture the spirit of a retro-futuristic paradise.

Casual, Easy-to-Learn Gameplay:

Whether you’re a casual gamer or an arcade driving enthusiast, Neon Highways offers simple controls so you can focus on enjoying the ride.

Unlock New Cars and Locations:

As you cruise, you’ll unlock stunning cars and dazzling new locations. Each car is a tribute to classic supercars, designed with sleek retro aesthetics and futuristic flair.

Synthwave Soundtrack:

The heart of this game is the music. Let yourself be immersed in a carefully curated selection of synthwave tracks that will make your drive even more exhilarating. Feel the retro beats fuel your journey as you cruise into the night.

Authentic Retro Visual FX:

Complete the neon‐tinged atmosphere with our suite of nostalgic video effects, including CRT scanlines, subtle film grain, and VHS‐style artifacts. These touches bring the spirit of old‐school arcade cabinets and retro TVs straight to your modern screen, enhancing the ‘80s vibe.


Grab the wheel, hit the open road, and let the retro sun guide you.

name: Neon Highways

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to a retro-futuristic '80s world of supercars, neon-lit cities, and synthwave beats. Neon Highways is an arcade racer where you cruise through vibrant cityscapes and endless highways, all set to an iconic synthwave soundtrack.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, Spanish - Latin America
